Item.Value: Ah, you must be the new one in town. Greetings to you, young one, I'm $0$, a purveyor of magical items. If you have the time to hear me out, I have some business for you.
You seem to be in a rush, don't let me keep you. I hope you have a good day.
Hello, $^$. Could you talk to $1$ for me by any chance? I worry about her, always pushing herself so hard.
For me? Oh, $^$, you shouldn't have.
I hope you can help me. Some upstart goblins snuck into my house last night and stole my orb. It's very precious to me, and I want it back. If you get it for me, I'll make it worth your while.
Oh thank you! Here, take this!
